title: ROOM NICE AREA PARIS  buttes chaumont
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Room to rent in an apartment in the Buttes Chaumont area.
The park is 30 meters from the apartment 
AVAILABLE from may the 1st 2021
Metro Laumiere
The appartment is about 75m2. 6th floor. last floor. stairs. Very calm.
Kitchen, three bedrooms, living room, bathroom with shower, toilette separated.
Internet. Washing machine.
Shared accommodation is for three people 
The bedroom available is coming with furniture.
2 minutes walking to the canal saint martin, 10 minutes to the park of la villette, 10 min walk to Paris center.
The monthly rent is 650 euros/ month + 1/3 gas electricity to share 
One month deposit required. No pets

ABOUT YOU: 
- 24 years old minimum, no couples, no exceptions.
- Long term, minimum 6 months
- Please bring proof of your professional or student status.
- Rent is paid in advance (in cash) plus a security deposit of 600 euros (cash or French bank check which I don't cash) refundable when you move out).
- I speak English, French and Spanish. 
Feel free to contact me by email
